description: Designed in collaboration with Chamonix-based guide, ski mountaineer and Mountain Hardwear athlete Vivian Bruchez, the Viv GORE-TEX® Pro Jacket is Mountain Hardwear's most technical ski shell that handles everything from steep resort runs to rap-in couloir lines. The three-layer GORE-TEX® Pro shell fabric provides uncompromising waterproof breathable protection, while the articulated, lightweight design retains essential features like a helmet-compatible hood and RECCO® avalanche rescue technology.
name: Mountain Hardwear Viv GTX Pro Jacket - Mens
